License FAQ ***********
- !Are my application affected by the GPL?! Answer: no, applications that use the WireAPI libraries are not affected by the GPL. WireAPI is 100% safe to use in commercial and proprietary applications.
- !When do I need an OEM license?! Answer: you need an OEM license to distribute proprietary products based on the OpenAMQ server source code. You do not need an OEM license to use the OpenAMQ server.
- !How much does an OEM license cost?! Answer: please send us an email to sales at iMatix dot com, with a description of your OEM product plan or proposal.
- !Is the free OpenAMQ software complete?! Answer: we don't believe in crippleware. We strive to make OpenAMQ the most complete open source AMQP solution available.
